assessment_item.title: BRJRNAQ3 The average kinetic energy of any ideal gas at a given temperature
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

The average kinetic energy of any ideal gas at a given temperature

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

depends on pressure of the gas

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:936"},{"text":"

depends on the nature of the gas 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:937"},{"text":"

depends on the speed of individual gas molecules      

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:947"},{"text":"

same for all gases
